+00002bb0: 0a23 2323 2320 2273 7461 636b 2220 6675  .#### "stack" fu
+00002bc0: 636e 7469 6f6e 0a49 2069 6d70 6c65 6d65  cntion.I impleme
+00002bd0: 6e74 6564 2074 6865 2060 7374 6163 6b60  nted the `stack`

+00002c30: 6f72 2042 7269 636b 7320 6f62 6a65 6374  or Bricks object
+00002c40: 7320 616c 6f6e 6720 7468 6520 7370 6563  s along the spec

+00002c60: 6173 2066 6f6c 6c6f 7773 2e0a 0a60 6060  as follows...```

+00003580: 6d5f 706f 696e 7428 6165 7328 226d 7067  m_point(aes("mpg
+00003590: 222c 2022 6469 7370 2229 2920 2b20 7468  ", "disp")) + th
+000035a0: 656d 6528 6669 6775 7265 5f73 697a 653d  eme(figure_size=
+000035b0: 2832 2c20 3329 2929 0a67 3220 3d20 7077  (2, 3))).g2 = pw
+000035c0: 2e6c 6f61 645f 6767 706c 6f74 2867 6770  .load_ggplot(ggp
+000035d0: 6c6f 7428 6d74 6361 7273 2920 2b20 6765  lot(mtcars) + ge
+000035e0: 6f6d 5f62 6f78 706c 6f74 2861 6573 2822  om_boxplot(aes("
+000035f0: 6765 6172 222c 2022 6469 7370 222c 2067  gear", "disp", g
+00003600: 726f 7570 203d 2022 6765 6172 2229 2920  roup = "gear")) 
+00003610: 2b20 7468 656d 6528 6669 6775 7265 5f73  + theme(figure_s
+00003620: 697a 653d 2832 2c20 3329 2929 0a67 3132  ize=(2, 3))).g12
+00003630: 203d 2067 3120 7c20 6732 0a67 3132 2e73   = g1 | g2.g12.s
+00003640: 6176 6566 6967 2829 0a60 6060 0a0a 3c69  avefig().```..<i
+00003650: 6d67 2073 7263 3d22 696d 672f 6731 322e  mg src="img/g12.
+00003660: 706e 6722 2077 6964 7468 3d22 3430 3078  png" width="400x
+00003670: 3430 3022 3e0a 0a60 6060 7079 7468 6f6e  400">..```python
+00003680: 0a67 3320 3d20 7077 2e6c 6f61 645f 6767  .g3 = pw.load_gg
+00003690: 706c 6f74 2867 6770 6c6f 7428 6d70 672c  plot(ggplot(mpg,
+000036a0: 2061 6573 2878 3d27 6469 7370 6c27 2c20   aes(x='displ',

+00003720: 2b20 6765 6f6d 5f62 6172 2861 6573 2822  + geom_bar(aes("

+00003770: 2e73 6176 6566 6967 2829 0a60 6060 0a3c  .savefig().```.<
+00003780: 696d 6720 7372 633d 2269 6d67 2f67 3132  img src="img/g12

+000037b0: 696c 733e 0a3c 2f64 6574 6169 6c73 3e20  ils>.</details> 
+000037c0: 0a0a 2323 2055 7361 6765 0a3e 205f 4966  ..## Usage.> _If
+000037d0: 2079 6f75 2077 616e 7420 746f 206b 6e6f   you want to kno
+000037e0: 7720 686f 7720 746f 2075 7365 2070 6174  w how to use pat
+000037f0: 6368 776f 726b 6c69 6220 696e 2064 6574  chworklib in det
+00003800: 6169 6c2c 2070 6c65 6173 6520 7365 6520  ail, please see 
+00003810: 5b41 5049 2e6d 645d 2868 7474 7073 3a2f  [API.md](https:/
+00003820: 2f67 6974 6875 622e 636f 6d2f 706f 6e6e  /github.com/ponn
+00003830: 6869 6465 2f70 6174 6368 776f 726b 6c69  hide/patchworkli
+00003840: 622f 626c 6f62 2f6d 6169 6e2f 4150 492e  b/blob/main/API.
+00003850: 6d64 292e 5f20 200a 3e0a 5573 696e 6720  md)._  .>.Using 
+00003860: 6070 6174 6368 776f 726b 6c69 6260 2c20  `patchworklib`, 
+00003870: 796f 7520 6361 6e20 7175 6963 6b6c 7920  you can quickly 
+00003880: 616e 6420 6672 6565 6c79 2061 7272 616e  and freely arran
+00003890: 6765 206d 6174 706c 6f74 6c69 6220 706c  ge matplotlib pl
+000038a0: 6f74 7320 7769 7468 206f 6e6c 7920 607c  ots with only `|
+000038b0: 6020 616e 6420 602f 6020 6f70 6172 6174  ` and `/` oparat
+000038c0: 6f72 7320 6173 2066 6f6c 6c6f 7773 2e0a  ors as follows..

+00004220: 2323 2031 2e20 496d 706f 7274 696e 6720  ## 1. Importing 
+00004230: 7061 7463 6877 6f72 6b6c 6962 206c 6962  patchworklib lib
+00004240: 7261 7279 0a0a 6060 6070 7974 686f 6e0a  rary..```python.
+00004250: 696d 706f 7274 2070 6174 6368 776f 726b  import patchwork
+00004260: 6c69 6220 6173 2070 7720 0a66 6d72 6920  lib as pw .fmri

+00004290: 2070 772e 4272 6963 6b28 2261 7831 222c   pw.Brick("ax1",
+000042a0: 2066 6967 7369 7a65 3d28 342c 3229 290a   figsize=(4,2)).
+000042b0: 736e 732e 6c69 6e65 706c 6f74 2878 3d22  sns.lineplot(x="
+000042c0: 7469 6d65 706f 696e 7422 2c20 793d 2273  timepoint", y="s
+000042d0: 6967 6e61 6c22 2c20 6875 653d 2272 6567  ignal", hue="reg

+00004310: 5f6c 6567 656e 6428 6e65 775f 6c6f 633d  _legend(new_loc=

+00004330: 7831 2e73 6574 5f74 6974 6c65 2822 6178  x1.set_title("ax
+00004340: 3122 290a 6060 600a 0a23 2323 2320 322e  1").```..#### 2.
+00004350: 2043 7265 6174 696e 6720 6578 616d 706c   Creating exampl
+00004360: 6520 706c 6f74 730a 200a 4372 6561 7469  e plots. .Creati
+00004370: 6e67 2073 6f6d 6520 6578 616d 706c 6520  ng some example 
+00004380: 706c 6f74 7320 7573 696e 6720 7468 6520  plots using the 
+00004390: 7365 6172 626f 726e 206d 6f64 756c 652e  searborn module.
+000043a0: 2042 7269 636b 2063 6c61 7373 2070 726f   Brick class pro
+000043b0: 7669 6465 6420 6279 2074 6865 2070 6174  vided by the pat
+000043c0: 6368 776f 726b 6c69 6220 6d6f 6475 6c65  chworklib module
+000043d0: 2069 7320 696d 706c 656d 656e 7465 6420   is implemented 
+000043e0: 6173 2073 7562 636c 6173 7320 6f66 2060  as subclass of `
+000043f0: 6d61 7470 6c6f 746c 6962 2e61 7865 732e  matplotlib.axes.
+00004400: 4178 6573 602e 2020 5468 6572 6566 6f72  Axes`.  Therefor
+00004410: 652c 2042 7269 636b 2063 6c61 7373 206f  e, Brick class o
+00004420: 626a 6563 7420 6361 6e20 6265 2067 6976  bject can be giv
+00004430: 656e 2074 6f20 7468 6520 7365 6162 6f72  en to the seabor
+00004440: 6e20 706c 6f74 2066 756e 6374 696f 6e73  n plot functions
+00004450: 2074 6861 7420 6861 7665 2074 6865 2060   that have the `
+00004460: 6178 6020 7061 7261 6d65 7465 7273 2e20  ax` parameters. 
+00004470: 200a 0a57 6865 6e20 6372 6561 7469 6e67   ..When creating
+00004480: 2061 2042 7269 636b 2063 6c61 7373 206f   a Brick class o
+00004490: 626a 6563 742c 2074 6865 2060 6c61 6265  bject, the `labe
+000044a0: 6c60 2076 616c 7565 2073 686f 756c 6420  l` value should 
+000044b0: 6265 2073 7065 6369 6669 6564 2c20 616e  be specified, an
+000044c0: 6420 6974 2073 686f 756c 6420 6265 2075  d it should be u
+000044d0: 6e69 7175 6520 616d 6f6e 6720 7468 6520  nique among the 
+000044e0: 4272 6963 6b20 636c 6173 7320 6f62 6a65  Brick class obje
+000044f0: 6374 7320 6765 6e65 7261 7465 6420 696e  cts generated in
+00004500: 2074 6865 2070 7974 686f 6e20 7363 7269   the python scri
+00004510: 7074 2028 4966 2074 6865 206c 6162 656c  pt (If the label
+00004520: 2076 616c 7565 2069 7320 6e6f 7420 7370   value is not sp
+00004530: 6563 6966 6965 642c 2074 6865 2075 6e69  ecified, the uni
+00004540: 7175 6520 6c61 6265 6c20 6e61 6d65 2069  que label name i
+00004550: 7320 6175 746f 6d61 7469 6361 6c6c 7920  s automatically 
+00004560: 6769 7665 6e2e 2042 7920 7573 696e 6720  given. By using 
+00004570: 6067 6574 5f6c 6162 656c 2829 6020 6d65  `get_label()` me
+00004580: 7468 6f64 2c20 7468 6520 7661 6c75 6520  thod, the value 
+00004590: 6361 6e20 6265 2063 6f6e 6669 726d 6564  can be confirmed
+000045a0: 292e 2054 6865 2060 6669 6769 7369 7a65  ). The `figisize
+000045b0: 6020 7061 7261 6d65 7465 7220 6361 6e20  ` parameter can 
+000045c0: 616c 736f 2062 6520 7370 6563 6966 6965  also be specifie
+000045d0: 642e 2048 6f77 6576 6572 2c20 7468 6520  d. However, the 
+000045e0: 7661 6c75 6520 6973 206e 6f74 2076 6572  value is not ver
+000045f0: 7920 696d 706f 7274 616e 7420 6265 6361  y important beca
+00004600: 7573 6520 7468 6520 6669 6775 7265 2073  use the figure s
+00004610: 697a 6520 6f66 2042 7269 636b 2063 6c61  ize of Brick cla
+00004620: 7373 206f 626a 6563 7473 2063 616e 2062  ss objects can b
+00004630: 6520 6175 746f 6d61 7469 6361 6c6c 7920  e automatically 
+00004640: 6164 6a75 7374 6564 2069 6e20 6172 7261  adjusted in arra
+00004650: 6e67 696e 6720 7468 6520 706c 6f74 732e  nging the plots.
+00004660: 2054 6865 2060 7361 7665 6669 6728 602a   The `savefig(`*
+00004670: 6066 696c 656e 616d 653d 7374 7260 2a60  `filename=str`*`
+00004680: 2960 206d 6574 686f 6420 7265 7475 726e  )` method return
+00004690: 7320 606d 6174 706c 6f74 6c69 622e 6669  s `matplotlib.fi
+000046a0: 6775 7265 2e46 6967 7572 6560 2063 6c61  gure.Figure` cla
+000046b0: 7373 206f 626a 6563 742e 2049 6620 6066  ss object. If `f
+000046c0: 696c 656e 616d 6560 2069 7320 6769 7665  ilename` is give
+000046d0: 6e2c 2074 6865 2066 6967 7572 6520 6f62  n, the figure ob
+000046e0: 6a65 6374 2063 616e 2062 6520 6f75 7470  ject can be outp
+000046f0: 7574 2074 6f20 7468 6520 6669 6c65 2e0a  ut to the file..
+00004700: 0a60 6060 7079 7468 6f6e 0a69 6d70 6f72  .```python.impor
+00004710: 7420 7365 6162 6f72 6e20 6173 2073 6e73  t seaborn as sns

+00005120: 3430 3078 3430 3022 3e0a 0a23 2323 2320  400x400">..#### 
+00005130: 332e 2041 7272 616e 6769 6e67 2061 6e64  3. Arranging and
+00005140: 2073 7461 636b 696e 6720 706c 6f74 730a   stacking plots.
+00005150: 0a54 6865 2070 6174 6368 776f 726b 6c69  .The patchworkli
+00005160: 6220 6d6f 6475 6c65 2070 726f 7669 6465  b module provide
+00005170: 7320 7477 6f20 6f70 6572 6174 6f72 7320  s two operators 
+00005180: 2220 607c 6022 2c20 2260 2f60 2220 7468  " `|`", "`/`" th
+00005190: 6174 2065 6e61 626c 6520 6465 7369 676e  at enable design
+000051a0: 696e 6720 7469 6479 206c 6179 6f75 7420  ing tidy layout 
+000051b0: 666f 7220 6d75 6c74 6970 6c65 2070 6c6f  for multiple plo
+000051c0: 7473 2077 6974 6820 7369 6d70 6c65 206f  ts with simple o
+000051d0: 7065 7261 7469 6f6e 732e 2054 6865 2022  perations. The "
+000051e0: 607c 6022 206f 7065 7261 746f 7220 7769  `|`" operator wi
+000051f0: 6c6c 2070 6c61 6365 2074 6865 2070 6c6f  ll place the plo
+00005200: 7473 2062 6573 6964 6520 6561 6368 206f  ts beside each o
+00005210: 7468 6572 2c20 7768 696c 6520 7468 6520  ther, while the 
+00005220: 2260 2f60 2220 6f70 6572 6174 6f72 2077  "`/`" operator w
+00005230: 696c 6c20 7374 6163 6b20 7468 656d 2e0a  ill stack them..
+00005240: 0a60 6060 7079 7468 6f6e 0a23 4172 7261  .```python.#Arra
+00005250: 6e67 6520 2261 7831 2c22 2022 6178 322c  nge "ax1," "ax2,
+00005260: 2220 616e 6420 2261 7834 2220 686f 7269  " and "ax4" hori
+00005270: 7a6f 6e74 616c 6c79 2e0a 6178 3132 3420  zontally..ax124 
+00005280: 3d20 6178 317c 6178 327c 6178 340a 6178  = ax1|ax2|ax4.ax
+00005290: 3132 342e 7361 7665 6669 6728 222e 2e2f  124.savefig("../
+000052a0: 696d 672f 6178 3132 342e 706e 6722 290a  img/ax124.png").

+00000d80: 206e 6f77 2062 6520 6861 6e64 6c65 6420   now be handled 
+00000d90: 6279 2070 6174 6368 776f 726b 6c69 622e  by patchworklib.
+00000da0: 0a2d 2044 6573 6372 6970 7469 6f6e 7320  .- Descriptions 
+00000db0: 6f66 2065 6163 6820 6675 6e63 7469 6f6e  of each function
+00000dc0: 2061 6e64 2063 6c61 7373 2070 726f 7669   and class provi

+00000de0: 6c69 6220 7761 7320 6164 6465 6420 746f  lib was added to
+00000df0: 2074 6869 7320 7265 706f 7369 746f 7279   this repository
+00000e00: 2e20 4966 2079 6f75 2077 616e 7420 746f  . If you want to
+00000e10: 206b 6e6f 7720 686f 7720 746f 2075 7365   know how to use

+000037c0: 0a0a 2323 2055 7361 6765 0a3e 205f 4966  ..## Usage.> _If
+000037d0: 2079 6f75 2077 616e 7420 746f 206b 6e6f   you want to kno

+00003820: 2f67 6974 6875 622e 636f 6d2f 706f 6e6e  /github.com/ponn

+00005130: 332e 2041 7272 616e 6769 6e67 2061 6e64  3. Arranging and
+00005140: 2073 7461 636b 696e 6720 706c 6f74 730a   stacking plots.
+00005150: 0a54 6865 2070 6174 6368 776f 726b 6c69  .The patchworkli
+00005160: 6220 6d6f 6475 6c65 2070 726f 7669 6465  b module provide
+00005170: 7320 7477 6f20 6f70 6572 6174 6f72 7320  s two operators
